short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto refresh tab or page with custom intervals

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A developer tool to refresh pages automatically at an interval of five seconds.
The interval is customizable and can be stopped or start as per need.
It can be used for load testing of web pages avoiding manual intervention.
